name: Hanna Petros
description: '''Hanna Petros''' ({{langx|aii|ܚܢܐ ܦܛܪܘܣ}}, {{langx|ar|حنا بطرس}}), was an Iraqi [[Assyrian people|Assyrian]] composer and a scholar. He wrote numerous books and treatises on oriental music, [[Iraqi Maqams]] and [[Syriac hymnody]]. He also established a renowned [[Baghdad Conservatory|conservatory]] in [[Baghdad]].
